name: B. Datatypes
statement:
Tattah’s youngest brother, Tuftuf, is new to programming.Since his older
brother is such a good programmer, his biggest dream is to outshine him.
Tuftuf is a student at the German University in Cairo (GUC) where he
learns to write programs in Gava.Today, Tuftuf was introduced to Gava’s
unsigned integer datatypes. Gava has unsigned integer datatypes of sizes
(in bits) . The -th datatype have size bits, so it can represent every
integer between and inclusive. Tuftuf is thinking of learning a better
programming language. If there exists an integer , such that fits in
some type (in bits) and does not fit in some other type (in bits) where
, then Tuftuf will stop using Gava.Your task is to determine Tuftuf’s
destiny.
